title: GODZILLA The Planet Eater
description: With the earth alliance weakened, Haruo weighs siding with the Exif, whose death cult is summoning a monster that can destroy the world.

title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
description: Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy and Scooby must stop a menacing scoundrel who plans to turn their town of Coolsville into the complete opposite.
